testcase.name: Validate common scenarios for multiplication via get call
Validate multiplication with two int values (happy path)
testcase.system-out:
* def operationURL = baseUrl + '/multiply' ................................ passed * def testDataInput = read('classpath:'+'resources/InputTestData.json') ... passed * def performMultiplication = function(op1,op2){return op1 * op2} ......... passed * call read('classpath:features/commons/CommonValidationsViaGet.feature') {opURL:'#(operationURL)'} . failed
Stack Trace: com.intuit.karate.exception.KarateException: ValidateMultiplicationGetAPI.feature:12 - CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:29 - status code was: 200, expected: 404, response time: 13, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/multiply, response: {"result":0} [4.3:57] CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:51 - status code was: 200, expected: 404, response time: 24, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/multiply?val1=+&val2=+, response: {"result":0} CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:69 - status code was: 200, expected: 404, response time: 4, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/multiply?val1=6&val2=8&val3=7, response: {"result":48} at ✽.* call read('classpath:features/commons/CommonValidationsViaGet.feature') {opURL:'#(operationURL)'} (ValidateMultiplicationGetAPI.feature:12)
* def operationURL = baseUrl + '/multiply' ................................ passed * def testDataInput = read('classpath:'+'resources/InputTestData.json') ... passed * def performMultiplication = function(op1,op2){return op1 * op2} ......... passed Given url operationURL .................................................... passed And param val1 = testDataInput[0].operand1 ................................ passed And param val2 = testDataInput[0].operand2 ................................ passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed Then print response ....................................................... passed And match $.result == performMultiplication(testDataInput[0].operand1,testDataInput[0].operand2) . passed
